title: DFG Team recruitment
body:
Digital Fury Gaming (DFG) is currently looking for players to form our 3 new teams for up coming online iron to gold tournaments, we're currently happy to take in anyone from silver 3 to gold 1 who seem keen enough to play for us and on the team with the other members. Current roles for each team : Top,Jungle,Mid,ADC,Support, 3 SUBS.
Requirements :
8-12 hours a week free time to scrim/practice
A working mic

Also looking for captains of each of the 3 teams if you feel like you fit this role or rather play on the team feel free to add me in game for more details

replies.body: Hi added you,Main adc, but can play other roles,will give you more info when added
